title: Onee Kyuuketsuki to Warawanai Maid
original_name: オネェ吸血鬼と笑わないメイド
sinopse: Pluto is a vampire who speaks flunetly like a woman and has many girly skills. For a girl(?) like him, came to work a maid, However, this maid is catastrophically clumsy, and her facial muscle don't even seem to work. This is their noisy comedy.
